author: pamarcelot
msg: Removed old Bash release script. We now have a 'release' task in the main build script as a replacement that is more cross-platform (since Windows machines can't run bash scripts).

author: pamarcelot
msg: Added a release task to the main build script. This task prepares the packages for a release (with all the necessary files, such as LICENSE.txt, etc.).

author: manjula
msg: Adding header files for secpolicy model.
